title: Low calorie, low sugar and low fat banana cocoa squares
ingredients: ['2 large ripe bananas', '1 large egg', '4 tablespoons Greek yoghurt', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons honey', '60g self-raising flour', '60g buckwheat flour (or any other type of flour)', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder']
